      Required Readings:

      Week 2

      In preparation for the guest lecture by Susannah Drake, read up about these two of her projects:
      Bight Coastal Urbanism
      Gowanus Canal Sponge Park

      and background information about the Gowanus Canal SuperFund site:
      Cleanup Pilot Project at Gowanus Canal
      A Community Guide to EPA’s Superfund Program
      Feasibility Study Gowanus Canal

      Suggested Readings

      New Yorker - Rewriting the Code of Life by Michael Specter

      MIT Journal of Design and Science

      • Design and Science of the Holobiont by Kevin Slavin
      • Invisible Inhabitants by Elizabeth Henaff

      Edward Tufte “Visual and Statistical Thinking” pgs 1-15 (in our shared Drive folder)

      Robin Sloan - Sourdough

      Dunne & Raby - Speculative Everything

      Extrapolation Factory - Operators Manual

      Rolling Stone - The Pandora’s Box Congress (1975) by Michael Rogers

      Edward Tufte “Seeing Around” (in shared Drive folder)

      Suggested Podcasts:

      Gastropod - Secrets of Sourdough
